html:
Cosmic rays get through me
Like an unnoticed messenger
Carrying unknown message
From distant worlds
While I sit over here
Growing my roots
Roots that will be hard to
Fully get unrooted
And scientists measure
When circuses travel
Through paths that they know
Simply very well
I want to walk at night
Under the shine of city lights
And not to be disrupted
Completely by anyone
title: Cosmic
